definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: turn about, go around, surround ( NH id., Pi. Hiph., and deriv.; Aram. [[סוֹבְבָא]] rim, border; Ar. sababun rope, sabiybun lock of hair; poss. also sab=a II. prepare a means of attaining sthg. Lane:1284);—
turn, intrans. (Impf. of form [[יִסּׂב]] in this sense only):

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: turn about, oft. as preliminary to something else 1Sa 15:12, 1Sa 15:27 (sq. inf.), 1Ch 16:43 (id.; [[וַ֫יׇּשָׁב]] in ‖ 2Sa 6:20) + 1Sa 14:21 (rd. [[סָֽבְבוּ גַם]] for MT [[סָבִיב]] [[וְגַם]], LXX SyrVer Vulgate Th We, etc.), Je 41:14 a (+ [[שׁוב]] v:b, but LXX om. v:a cf. Gie), Ec 1:6, Ec 1:6; of door, Pr 26:14 turn on ([[עַל]]) its hinge (cf. Niph. Ez Eze 26:2); turn (toward one) 1Sa 22:17, 1Sa 22:18, 1Sa 22:18, 2Sa 18:30, 2Sa 18:30, Ct So 2:17 (v. Bu); also c. [[אֶל־]] 2Sa 14:24, 2Sa 14:24; + 2Sa 24:6 (rd. [[סָֽבְבוּ]] for [[סָבִיב]] We Dr Bu Kit HPS; Klo [[יׇסׂבוּ]], cf. Löhr), Ez Eze 42:19, Ec 1:6, [[אֶל־אַחֲרָָי]] 2Ki 9:18, 2Ki 9:19; of cup of ´[[י]], it shall come round unto ([[עַל־]], with hostile implic.; [[עָבַר עַל]] La 4:22) Hb Hab 2:16; of Jordan, turn [[לְאָחוֹר]] Ps 114:3, Ps 114:5; turn about from ([[מֵעַל]]) Ge 42:24, ([[מִן]]) 1Sa 18:11, + [[אֶל־]] 1Sa 17:30; so of inheritance Nu 36:7 it shall not go about from ([[מִן]]) tribe to ([[אֶל־]]) tribe, also v:Nu 36:9 ([[לְ]] for [[אֶל־]]); cf. (abs.) [[וַתִּסּׂב הַמְּלוּכָה וַתְּהִי לְאָתִי]] 1Ki 2:15 (cf.

definitions.title: Hiph. 1 b
definitions.body: ); = be brought round, c. acc. loc. 1Sa 5:8 (of ark).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: turn = change, only Zec 14:10 (of land, changed like [[[כְּ]], i.e. into] a plain), cf.

definitions.title: Hiph. 1 c. c.
definitions.body: fig. turn (in a new direction) to do something (inf.) Ec 2:20, Ec 7:25.—Ps 71:21 is dub.; Bae reads [[וְתָשֻׁב]] for [[וְתִסּׂב]] after LXX SyrVer Vulgate; Hup-Now Che al. sub

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: supr.: turn, comfort me.—Job 10:8 rd. [[אַחַר תִּסּׂב]] for MT [[יחד]] [[סביב]] De al.

definitions.title: 2. a.
definitions.body: march, or walk, around, c. acc. (city) Jos 6:3, Jos 6:4, Jos 6:7, Jos 6:14, Jos 6:15, Jos 6:15 (all JE), Ps 48:13; poss. also [[נׇסׂב]] 1Sa 16:11 (of marching about altar? so HPS; turn to do something else Th), but cf. [[תסוב]] Sir 32:1 sit about a table (v. Schechter:BS p. 56, and cf. [[מֵסַב]]), or rd. [[נֵשֵׁב]] Weir in Dr Kit Bu Löhr (perh.).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: go partly round, circle about, skirt, c. acc. (land) Nu 21:4 (JE) Ju Jdg 11:18, also De 2:1, De 2:3; of rivers Ge 2:11, Ge 2:13.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: make a round, or circuit, go about to, c. acc. loc. 1Sa 7:16; go about in ([[בְּ]]) 2Ch 17:9, cf. also (c. [[בְּ]]) 2Ch 23:2, Ct So 3:5, So 5:7, Ec 12:5, so c. acc. Is 23:16; = make a circuitous march 2Ki 3:9 (c. acc. [[דֶּרֶח]]).—Vid. also 2Sa 5:23, 1Ch 14:14

definitions.title: Hiph. 2 a. d.
definitions.body: surround, encompass, abs. Ge 37:7 (E); c. acc. Job 40:22; with hostile purpose, 2Ki 6:15, Ec 9:14 (both of siege), cf. 2Ki 3:25; acc. om. Ju Jdg 16:2, cf. 2Sa 18:15; c. acc. rei + [[עַל־]] pers. Ju Jdg 20:5; c. [[עַל־]] pers. alone Job 16:13, 2Ch 18:31; c. [[אֶל־]] pers. 2Ki 8:21 = 2Ch 21:9; oft. fig. in poetry, c. acc. Ho 7:2, 2Sa 22:6 = Ps 18:6, Ps 22:13, Ps 22:17, Ps 49:6, Ps 88:18, Ps 118:10, Ps 118:11, Ps 118:11, Ps 118:12; so also Ps 17:11 (Kt [[סְבָבוּנִי]], Qr [[סְבָבוּנוּ]]; on text v. esp. Hup-Now); lit. of cord surrounding (measuring circumf. of), c. acc. 1Ki 7:15 = Je 52:21, 1Ki 7:23 = 2Ch 4:2; of ornaments, etc., surrounding something (acc.) 1Ki 7:24, 2Ch 4:3; surround one with something (2 acc.) 1Ki 5:17, Ps 109:3; acc. + [[בְּ]] instr. Ho 12:1; [[לָעׂפֶל]] ´[[ס]] 2Ch 33:14 (i.e. build a wall around it).—1Sa 22:22 rd. [[חַבְתִּי]] (√ [[חוּב]]), LXX SyrVer Th We Dr Kit Bu Löhr HPS.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[נׇסַב]] Jos 15:3 +; 3 fs. [[נׇסֵ֫בָּה]] Ez Eze 26:2 (Ges:§ 67 t St:§ 410 b Kö:i. 342); [[וְנׇֽסְבָה]] Eze 41:7 (but rd. [[וְנוֹסְפָה]] Ew Sm Co Toy:Hpt, cf. Berthol); 3 pl. [[נׇסַ֫בּוּ]] Ge 19:4 +; Impf. 3 mpl. [[יִסַּ֫בּוּ]] Ez Eze 1:9 + 5 t.;—

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: turn oneself against ([[עַל־]]), close round upon ([[עַל]]) Ge 19:4 (J) Jos 7:9 (JE); c. acc. Ju Jdg 19:22.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: turn round (from a direct course), of wheels Ez Eze 1:9, Eze 1:12, Eze 1:17, Eze 10:11, Eze 10:11, also v:Eze 10:16 (but dub., Co [[ישׁבו]], Toy:Hpt leave, Symm a)pelei/ponto); [[נׇסֵ֫בָּה אֵלַי]] Ez Eze 26:2 of Jerus. under fig. of door (Sm Co Berthol Toy:Hpt).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: esp. of boundary (Hex only P): turn round from ([[מִן]]), toward ([[לְ]]) Nu 34:4, + [[ה]] loc. Jos 18:14; c. [[מִן]] + [[ה]] loc. + [[אֶל־]] Jos 15:10; c. [[מִן]] alone Nu 34:5; c. [[ה]] loc. alone Je 31:39, Jos 15:3, Jos 16:6; circle about, skirt, c. acc. Jos 19:14.
pass. be turned over to ([[לְ]]), into the power of, Je 6:12.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Inf.cstr. [[סַבֵּב אֶת־פְּנֵי הַדָּבָר]] 2Sa 14:20 to change, transform, the aspect of the matter.

definitions.title: Poï.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. sf. [[יְסׂבְבֵנִי]] Jon 2:4, Jon 2:6, [[יְסׂבְבֶנְהוּ]] De 32:10, [[יְסוֹבְבֶנּוּ]] Ps 32:10; 3 fs. [[תְּסוֹבֵב]] Je 31:22, etc.;—encompass, surround (poet. and chiefly late):—

encompass (with protection), c. acc. De 32:10 ( ´[[י]] subj.), c. 2 acc. [[חֶסֶד יְסוֹבְבֶנּוּ]] Ps 32:10, cf. v:Ps 32:7 (but 2nd obj. here dub.); similarly [[נְקֵבָה]] [[תְּסוֹבֵב גׇּ֑בֶר]] Je 31:22 i.e. either shall protect (so most) or (Che, cf. Gf) the woman (fig. of Isr.), instead of holding aloof ([[הַבַּת הַשּׁוֹבֵבָה]] v:Je 31:22), will, in the new future which ´[[י]] creates, with affection press round her divine husband.
come about, assemble round (acc. pers. ´[[י]]) Ps 7:8.
march or go about, city (acc.) Ps 55:11, Ps 59:7, Ps 59:15; altar (in solemn procession) Ps 26:6; go about  in ([[בְּ]]) city Ct So 3:2.
enclose, envelop, c. acc. pers. Jon 2:4, Jon 2:6 (of waters).
